answer:
According to the History of Immunization in BC, the following vaccines were offered in school programs in the 1990s:

		1992 to present-Hepatitis B, Grade 6 (birth year cohort 1981)

		1996-Measles/Rubella (MR), Elementary through post-secondary school students (birth year cohort 1979-1991)

		1997-Hepatitis B, Grade 12 (birth year cohort 1980)
Tips for locating immunization records are here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:

## 1992 to present-Hepatitis B, Grade 6 (birth year cohort 1981)

		1996-Measles/Rubella (MR), Elementary through post-secondary school students (birth year cohort 1979-1991)

		1997-Hepatitis B, Grade 12 (birth year cohort 1980)
Tips for locating immunization records are here.

Immunization Nurse
question: My children went to school in Vancouver Island area in the 1990's . Is it possible to find out what vaccinations they would have received in school? Thanks
question_variation_0: when were vaccines given for vaccines for school
question_variation_1: what vaccinations did my children receive in school
question_variation_2: what vaccines would have been given to them if they were at school
